Posts.Content: [color=indigo I was DX in july with a recurance of Breast cancer and Bone matastsis. They have told me that the cancer does not get restaged. Or they keep saying they can't give me a time line if i do or do not to chemo. Is there any site you can go and put your info treatments and get a basic time line? Thanx [/b]
